item.title: Street lighting prevented from reaching the pavement due to lower branches of tree being in full leaf alongside street light outside 46 Clock House Road. Grateful if these could be removed as in previous years., 3rd July
item.description:
Lower branches of tree outside 46 Clock House road need pruning as preventing street lighting reaching pavement area. 2 further large trees on Clock House road, on the other side of the Queens Road junction - on the same side of the road - are causing the same problem and making these areas very dark at night for pedestrians walking home in the dark.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clock House Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smelling bins, 3rd July
item.description:
All the bins on Thames path are disgusting. Obviously not been emptied for days. Includes rotting food, dog waste. Spilling over in to Thames and impacting local wild life.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blackwall Tunnel, Greenwich Peninsula, London

item.title: Two speakers crackling/white noise, both in Westwood Lane car park, either end of the car park, nearest the houses, 3rd July
item.description:

item.title: A car parked against bin wall where it says no parking, 3rd July
item.description:
The car is parked against a bin wall where it clearly states no parking also it is a obstruction where this is the only entrance my daughter uses to go get to her transport as sheâ€™s not able to go down curbs and I donâ€™t want her taccidentally hitting the car or hurting herself so not is it a hazard for the car to be parked there? Itâ€™s also illegal for it to be parked there. The car has been parked there for three days now.
